blogs.title: New method to measure black hole spin rate raises questions
blogs.summary: Nature: Black holes have two fundamental characteristics—mass and spin. Mass is relatively easy to measure. Spin, a black hole’s angular momentum, is much more difficult. The current technique involves evaluating the iron emission line present in x rays em

q&a.title: Typical rotation speeds for black holes
q&a.summary:
I am curious as to how rapidly most black holes are spinning. A refinement of the question could be: how rapidly are typical supermassive black holes spinning? 

I ask because I have the impression that we have not measured the spins of too many black hole

wikipedia.title: Abhas Mitra
wikipedia.summary: Abhas Mitra (born 3 June 1955) is an Indian astrophysicist best known for his distinct views on several front-line astrophysics concepts, particularly black holes and Big Bang Cosmology.
